name: AMERICAN FRATERNAL ALLIANCE
description: Trade Association for fraternal benefit societies
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to taxation of insurance companies and their products, and regulation of insurance companies and insurance products.

Issues related to taxation of insurance companies and their products, and regulation of insurance companies and insurance products.  Education and advocacy around taxation of fraternal benefit societies. Taxation of life insurance and advocacy around 501(c)(8) fraternal benefit societies.
